Articles.Content:
Long-time lurker ... thought I'd officially join the fine community here and see how I can contribute.

I purchased the game back in May, been playing ever since. I can't get enough of it. And the mods! My goodness, they've made me SO happy. I've even gone so far as to tweak some parts for my own use, and create a couple of new ones that I needed (based on existing ones, of course).

It's not a Friday night unless I get some extended KSP time logged. I'm sure everyone here can relate. Some people go to the local pub ... we go to our Space Stations and do science.

Anyway, I look forward to participating in the never-ending struggle of discovery.
Welcome aboard! I'm looking forward to your forum-ing!

Hello there!

EVA during ascent is not a good idea!
